titles.title: White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
A bill to redesignate the Sullys Hill National Game Preserve in the State of North Dakota as the White Horse Hill National Game Preserve.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held. Business Meeting printed. S. Hrg. 116-222.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Barrasso without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 223.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
This bill redesignates the Sullys Hill National Game Preserve in North Dakota as the "White Horse Hill National Game Preserve."
